home.practiceStats.title: PRACTICE STATS
home.practiceStats.description: Aggregated lap times based on best sectors from Practice sessions with actual standings comparison
home.raceAnalysis.title: RACE ANALYSIS
home.raceAnalysis.description: Live position changes, gap analysis, and interval tracking for individual drivers throughout the race
home.tyreStrategy.title: TYRE STRATEGY
home.tyreStrategy.description: Tire usage analytics showing new and used compound counts across all practice sessions
home.stintAnalysis.title: STINT ANALYSIS
home.stintAnalysis.description: Detailed stint breakdowns including lap times, tire compounds, and performance metrics per driver
home.teamRadio.title: TEAM RADIO
home.teamRadio.description: Complete team radio communications from practice, qualifying, and race sessions
